QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Note: The use of the CIM_NetworkVirtualAdapter class has been deprecated. A specific association is not needed. Instead use the CIM_ConcreteIdentity class. Deprecated description: NetworkVirtual Adapter describes that an instance of NetworkAdapter is actually the result of several Adapters participating in a load-balanced RedundancyGroup.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Note: The use of this method has been deprecated. Deprecated description: The 'virtual' NetworkAdapter.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Note: The use of this method has been deprecated. Deprecated description: The ExtraCapacity RedundancyGroup that describes the load balancing. The result of the load balancing is the 'virtual' Adapter.
